Unable to process.");    }  }  // PRIVATE   private final Path fFilePath;  private final static Charset ENCODING = StandardCharsets.UTF_8;    private static void log(Object aObject){    System.out.println(String.valueOf(aObject));  }  private String quote(String aText){    String QUOTE = "'";    return QUOTE + aText + QUOTE;  }}
